Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Caribbean \Car`ib*be"an\, Caribbee \Car`ib*bee\, a. Of or pertaining to the Caribs, to their islands (the eastern and southern West Indies), or to the sea (called the Caribbean sea) lying between those islands and Central America. [1913 Webster]
Caribbean n 1: an arm of the Atlantic Ocean between North and South America; the origin of the Gulf stream [syn: {Caribbean Sea}] 2: region including the Caribbean islands
